item.title: Tuesday January 8, 2008
item.description: Using http://www.online-stopwatch.com/large-stopwatch/, I read the Hardy Boys book The Tower Treasure in 1 hour and 11 minutes and 1 second. That is shorter than the movie would be. This beats my previous (and first) record of 1 hour and 45 minutes, roughly. Ryan Originally posted at classicalRyan.xanga.com
